text: @realDonaldTrump Why did you appoint a new team? Why didn’t the global pandemic response team jump on it immediately? Oh, wait. You disbanded that trained emergency response team because Obama had started it. Feeling pretty good about that decision now, are you, Mar-a-Lardo? #corona #Trumpdemic
